description:
It was discovered that minimatch did not perform necessary bounds checking
on regular expressions. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a
denial of service.

node-minimatch.description: Convert glob expressions into RegExp objects for Node.js
Convert glob expressions into RegExp objects for Node.js

title: minimatch vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
minimatch could be made to crash if it received specially crafted
input.
